response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its true worth to be $15,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price of $14,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while allowing me to maximize the product's worth. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or finalizing the purchase.", "product_price": 14000}
